events.message: We have received the application of the candidate for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate’s experience as a software developer.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate and coordinate further steps.
Initial phone screening was conducted successfully to assess the candidate’s fit for the software developer role.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with technical interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to evaluate their software engineering skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance in coding exercises and system design.
HR interview has been scheduled as the next step to discuss company values and benefits with the candidate.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate showing clear alignment with company culture and career goals.
An offer has been formally proposed to the candidate, outlining compensation, benefits, and role expectations.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
The candidate accepted the job offer, confirming their commitment and readiness to start onboarding.
Onboarding has begun successfully with the candidate completing all initial training and paperwork.
The recruitment process is now closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team.
